name: Salaryman RESCUE!
description:
VR-exclusive Salaryman RESCUE! plunges you into the vibey, citypop-kissed streets of Tokyo, tasked with guiding wave after wave of groggy salarymen to safety - by any means necessary! Use zany physics toys and automation management to solve wave after wave of puzzles, avoiding the Tokyo traffic and the looming threat of UFO abduction!

---

🍺 Key Features

  • 🎵 Citypop Vibes: Soak in neon-lit vibes and a wavey, dreamy aesthetic, perfectly capturing that citypop nostalgia!
  • 👨🏻‍💼Save the Salarymen!: Endless waves of tipsy office workers need your help to get home safely.
  • 🧩 Challenging Waves & Puzzles: Every wave presents a unique challenge, each with multiple solutions. It’s up to you to strategize, experiment, and find the most efficient way to guide the salarymen safely home.
  • 🚗 Ragdoll Hilarity: Stay alert! The bustling traffic isn’t kind to our inebriated salarymen. It might be hilarious, but try to avoid letting speeding vehicles send them ragdolling across the streets.
  • 🛸 Watch Out For UFOs: Safeguard the skies and thwart UFOs attempting to abduct the wandering salarymen, using a variety of tools and tactics.
  • 🪙 Coin-Operated Mechanics: Explore the vibrant streets to discover hidden coins - then use them in various coin-operated machines to unlock new strategies and solutions.


---

Ready to embark on a neon-soaked adventure? These salarymen ain't gonna rescue themselves! Grab your VR headset and join the rescue mission today!
